questions.question: This story arc is named after a marine fortress and features the first appearance of Admiral Aokiji. What is...?
questions.answer: The Long Ring Long Land Arc

questions.question: This arc focuses on the backstory of Sanji and his connections to the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to an island in the Grand Line, where they battle against the Warlord of the Sea, Crocodile. What is...?
This technique, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows the user to create and manipulate poison. What is...?
This devil fruit allows its user to create tremors capable of causing massive destruction, and was notably used by one of the Yonko. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to transform into a large bird and control ice. What is...?
This character, a princess of the Fish-Man Island, has the ability to communicate with sea kings. Who is...?
This character, known for their Straw Hat, is the captain of the Straw Hat Pirates and dreams of becoming the Pirate King. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'Black Leg', is the Straw Hat Pirates' chef and a master of Black Leg Style martial arts. Who is...?
